Package net.firstpartners.core.drools

Class RuleRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.firstpartners.core.drools.RuleRunner
  • public class RuleRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Call JBoss Drools (Rules Engine) passing in Document data as Java Objects This class uses an IDocumentStrategy Object to handle different types
